alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schenectady; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 7:40PM EST until December 19 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek at Burtonsville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water reaches Priddle Camp Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 6.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Burtonsville Flood Stage: 6.0 Observed Stage at Mon 7 pm: 6.6 Forecast: Tue 1 am 7.2 Tue 7 am 6.3 Tue 1 pm 5.4 Tue 7 pm 4.9 Wed 1 am 4.5 Wed 7 am 4.2 Wed 1 pm 3.9 Wed 7 pm 3.6 Thu 1 am 3.3 Thu 7 am 3.2 Thu 1 pm 3.0 &&
